items.title: Lawyer for accused MS-13 leader asks court to delay gun charge dismissal
items.summary: The newly appointed public defender for Henrry Villatoro Santos is asking the court to delay the dismissal of his charges for 14 days in order to get Santos immigration counsel. News4’s Jackie Bensen reports.

items.title: ‘Just here in the dark': family demands answers after Bowie man dies in Bahamas
items.summary: A Family in Maryland is desperate for answers after their 23-year-old son was found dead on the beach during their vacation to the Bahamas. Police there say the young man drowned, but they worry there may have been foul play. News4’s Jessica Albert reports.

video_archive.title: ‘For me, Medicaid cuts are life or death': Why patients rallied in DC
video_archive.summary: “We’re here to say no.” Protesters rallied at a Medicaid March in D.C. on Tuesday. One Medicaid recipient explained how the health care gave her treatment she needed to be able to walk again and finish her degree. News4’s Juliana Valencia reports.
